summary: A brave queen battles an evil mystic. Three generations later, he comes back to haunt the queen's descendants.
cast: Anushka Shetty|Sonu Sood|Divya Nagesh|Aachi Manorama|Sayaji Shinde|Deepak|Satyanarayana Kaikala|Arjan Bajwa|Leena Sidhu
keywords: female protagonist|buried alive|haunted mansion|reincarnation|character name as title
title: Arundhati
